### Index-at-age

```{r}
plot_obs_pred(d, frame = ~age, color = ~model, 
              colors = cols, ylab = "Index")
```

### Catchability

```{r}
qest <- d
names(qest)[names(qest) == "q"] <- "est"
u_qest <- unique(qest[, c("model", "age", "est")])
if (any(duplicated(u_qest[, c("model", "age")]))) {
  u_qest <- unique(qest[, c("model", "age", "year", "est")])
  plot_trend(u_qest, x = ~age, xlab = "Age", ylab = "q", color = ~model, colors = cols, frame = ~year)
} else {
  plot_trend(u_qest, x = ~age, xlab = "Age", ylab = "q", color = ~model, colors = cols)
}
```
